name: Julia
description: High-performance, dynamic programming language for technical computing, solving the two-language problem.

name: Node.js
description: JavaScript runtime that enables server-side scripting and building fast, scalable network applications.

name: Makie.jl
description: Visualization library in Julia for interactive data visualization and real-time graphics, key for Tul.jl.

name: DataFrames.jl
description: Package for working with tabular data in Julia, essential for OptiX.jl.

name: RigidBodyDynamics.jl
description: Library for multibody dynamics with a focus on human biomechanics, highly relevant for Tul.jl.

name: DifferentialEquations.jl
description: Powerful suite for solving differential equations, key for biomechanical modeling in Tul.jl.

name: MarketData.jl
description: Julia package for handling historical and real-time financial data, used in OptiX.jl.

name: OnlineStats.jl
description: For computing streaming statistics on large datasets in OptiX.jl.

name: Docker
description: Containerization tool for consistent and portable environments.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Relational database system for handling large amounts of financial data in OptiX.jl.

name: Obsidian
description: Markdown-based knowledge management tool for organizing research and project notes.

name: Emacs
description: Versatile text editor for coding, note-taking, and project management.

name: WebGLMakie
description: Browser-based visualization framework for rendering interactive biomechanical models in Tul.jl.

name: Dagger.jl
description: Parallel computing framework for distributed workloads, useful for both Tul.jl and OptiX.jl.

name: Puppeteer
description: Automation library for web scraping and testing in Node.js, useful for data gathering.

name: ModelingToolkit.jl
description: A Julia-based modeling framework for building and analyzing systems of equations, potentially useful for biomechanics in Tul.jl.

name: Rust
description: Memory-safe systems programming language, useful for performance-critical tasks or real-time constraints in biomechanical simulations.

name: C++
description: Low-level language for fine-grained performance control, useful for real-time physics simulations in Tul.jl.

name: Plots.jl
description: A high-level plotting library in Julia, to explore alternative visualization strategies for OptiX.jl.

name: Flux.jl
description: Machine learning library in Julia, useful for experimenting with predictive models in OptiX.jl.
